pullRequest.title: #1470: Improve test coverage for org.cactoos.collection
pullRequest.bodyText:
Per #1470

Improve test based on problems found in #1470

nodes.bodyText: @andreoss Please, use LengthOf instead of calling #size().
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -48,8 +47,8 @@ void size() {
             "size() must be equals to original",
             new Immutable<>(
                 new ListOf<>(1, 2)
-            ),
-            new HasSize(2)
+            ).size(),

nodes.bodyText: @andreoss I think we must improve this message to something like Must behave as a no null collection" to emphasize the no nulls capability. WDYT?
@andreoss Please, add a test to check a new NoNulls(new ListOf<>()) (a list already created empty).
